about.title: About Us.
about.subtitle: Complete legal solutions for your needs
about.description_1: Lawstand is a digital platform that makes legal guidance simple and accessible for everyone, including foreigners living in Vietnam. It offers bilingual legal search (Vietnamese–English), AI-powered summaries that turn lengthy regulations into under-100-word highlights with real-world examples, and a 24/7 legal chatbot that instantly answers common questions.
about.description_2: Need expert help? Easily browse transparent lawyer profiles, view credentials and reviews, and book consultations online. Designed for speed and scale, Lawstand handles thousands of users simultaneously on both mobile apps and web, helping you understand and navigate the law with confidence.

faq.a1: LawStand is an AI-powered legal consulting platform that connects users with professional Vietnamese lawyers. Our goal is to make legal advice more accessible, fast, and affordable for everyone.
faq.q2: How does the AI legal assistant work?
faq.a2: Our AI assistant is trained on Vietnamese laws and legal documents. It provides quick, reliable answers to legal questions. For complex cases, users can book an appointment with a licensed lawyer for a personalized consultation.
faq.q3: Can I book an appointment with a real lawyer?
faq.a3: Yes. You can browse our list of experienced Vietnamese lawyers, choose your preferred one, and schedule an appointment either online or in person.
faq.q4: What are the differences between the subscription plans?
faq.a4: The Free plan includes basic AI legal Q&A. The Standard plan adds more AI credits and limited lawyer booking. The Professional plan gives full access to AI, priority booking, and exclusive legal document templates.
faq.a5: Absolutely. All personal data and conversation history are encrypted and stored under strict security standards. LawStand follows privacy laws to protect user information.
faq.a6: You can cancel an appointment 24 hours before the appointment time. Please contact us for support.
